document.heading: Transportation Infrastructure Improvements GARVEE Bond Financing Amendment Act of 2013

history.narrative: Law 20-124, the “Transportation Infrastructure Improvements GARVEE Bond Financing Amendment Act of 2013,” was introduced in Council and assigned Bill No. 20-546. The Bill was adopted on first and second readings on April 8, 2014, and May 6, 2014, respectively. Signed by the Mayor on May 22, 2014, it was assigned Act No. 20-337 and transmitted to Congress for its review. D.C. Law 20-124 became effective on July 16, 2014.
